content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsworkshopsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/enem/MICRODADOS_ENEM_2019.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
        FIRSTROW = 2
    ) AS [result]

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'trusted_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [trusted_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://adlsworkshopsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE EnemFiltrado (
	[SG_UF_RESIDENCIA] varchar(8000),
	[TP_SEXO] varchar(8000),
	[TP_ESTADO_CIVIL] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'enem/*.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [trusted_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT top 10 * FROM EnemFiltrado
GO

SELECT
   top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsworkshopsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/enem/MICRODADOS_ENEM_2019.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://adlsworkshopsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTrip (
	[DateID] int,
	[MedallionID] int,
	[HackneyLicenseID] int,
	[PickupTimeID] int,
	[DropoffTimeID] int,
	[PickupGeographyID] int,
	[DropoffGeographyID] int,
	[PickupLatitude] float,
	[PickupLongitude] float,
	[PickupLatLong] varchar(8000),
	[DropoffLatitude] float,
	[DropoffLongitude] float,
	[DropoffLatLong] varchar(8000),
	[PassengerCount] int,
	[TripDurationSeconds] int,
	[TripDistanceMiles] float,
	[PaymentType] varchar(8000),
	[FareAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[SurchargeAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TaxAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TipAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TollsAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TotalAmount] numeric(19,4)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'NYCabs/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_adlsworkshopsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

select top 10 * from NYCTrip

GO
SELECT count(*) FROM NYCTrip
group by [DateID]
GO

source:
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *

# Primary storage info
account_name = 'adlsworkshopsynapse' # fill in your primary account name
container_name = 'raw' # fill in your container name
relative_path = 'enem' # fill in your relative folder path

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path)
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path)

parquet_path = adls_path + '/*.parquet'
print('parquet file path: ' + parquet_path)
#json_path = adls_path + 'arq.json'
#print('json file path： ' + json_path)
#csv_path = adls_path + 'arq.csv'
#print('csv file path: ' + csv_path)

%%sql

select TP_SEXO, count(*)
from Enem
group by TP_SEXO

dfEnemNovo = spark.sql(
"""select TP_SEXO, count(*)
from Enem
group by TP_SEXO""")

account_name = 'adlsworkshopsynapse' # fill in your primary account name
container_name = 'trusted' # fill in your container name
relative_path = 'enem' # fill in your relative folder path

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path)
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path)
